001package net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns;
002
003import java.lang.annotation.*;
004
005/**
006 * Marks a type or member as part of the
007 * <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adapter_pattern">Adapter design pattern</a>.
008 * <p>
009 * The Adapter is a structural pattern that allows objects with
010 * incompatible interfaces to collaborate by translating the interface
011 * of one class into an interface expected by the client.
012 * </p>
013 *
014 * <h2>Example:</h2>
015 * <pre>{@code
016 * // Target
017 * interface JsonParser {
018 *     Map<String, Object> parse(String json);
019 * }
020 *
021 * // Adaptee (incompatible interface)
022 * class LegacyParser {
023 *     Document parseXml(String xml) { ... }
024 * }
025 *
026 * // Adapter
027 * @Adapter(role = Adapter.Role.ADAPTER)
028 * class XmlToJsonAdapter implements JsonParser {
029 *     private final LegacyParser adaptee = new LegacyParser();
030 *     public Map<String, Object> parse(String json) {
031 *         String xml = convertJsonToXml(json);
032 *         return convertDocToMap(adaptee.parseXml(xml));
033 *     }
034 * }
035 * }</pre>
036 *
037 * <p>
038 * This annotation belongs to the
039 * {@link DesignPattern.Category#STRUCTURAL} category and is retained in
040 * source for documentation and static analysis.
041 * </p>
042 *
043 * @see DesignPattern
044 */
045@Documented
046@DesignPattern(DesignPattern.Category.STRUCTURAL)
047@Retention(RetentionPolicy.SOURCE)
048@Target({ElementType.TYPE, ElementType.METHOD, ElementType.CONSTRUCTOR})
049public @interface Adapter {
050
051}
